testMessages.title: Production Emergency (Incorrectly marked Low)
expectedIssues: Should be High urgency but marked as Low (too short)

testMessages.title: Friendly Thank You (Incorrectly marked High)
testMessages.message: Thank you so much! Your team has been incredibly helpful and I really appreciate the fast response to my question earlier today!
expectedIssues: Should be Low urgency but marked as High (contains '!')

testMessages.title: Feature Request (Wrong Template)
testMessages.message: Could you add an export to CSV feature? Would be really useful for my monthly reports.
expectedIssues: Recommended action will be 'Ask user to check billing portal'

testMessages.title: Billing + Technical Hybrid (Ambiguous)
testMessages.message: My payment failed and now I can't access the dashboard. Is there a bug or do I need to update my credit card?
expectedIssues: Category unclear - could be Billing or Technical
May produce inconsistent results on repeated analysis

testMessages.title: Urgent Short Message
expectedIssues: Marked as Low urgency due to short length

testMessages.title: Long Rambling Non-Urgent
testMessages.message: Hi! I was just browsing through your website and noticed you have a really nice design! I especially like the color scheme and the way you've organized the navigation menu! Everything looks so professional and clean! Just wanted to share my positive feedback!
expectedIssues: Marked as High urgency due to multiple '!'
Actually not urgent at all - just positive feedback

testMessages.title: General Inquiry
expectedIssues: Short message marked as Low urgency
